cs213.photoAlbum.simpleview

Class CmdView

  • java.lang.Object
    • cs213.photoAlbum.simpleview.CmdView

  • public class CmdView
extends java.lang.Object
    Class is an implementation of the initial command line view. It takes commands from the user, validates their syntactic correctness, and calls methods on the control object to manipulate the model accordingly. Class also contains the main method for the project.
    Author:
    Karan Kadaru
